Summary: Black triangle with bright huge spotlights
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Kennewick
There were no other sightings in Kennewick on or around February 3rd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on the highway and could see huge spotlights in the sky, it seemed as if they were moving very slow. the lights were so big and bright I could see the beams shining down to the ground, I knew id never seen any lights this big on a plan or any thing we have. and then as I was just coming beside it on the highway I could see that it was a triangle craft, jet black the size of a gas station or so, with two spot light on the front and one bigger one undernethe at the pointy side of the triangle, I pulled over my car and I heard no sound coming from it. it had came to a stop and was floating in mid-air, I stupidly flashed my headlights, about two seconds later it started lowering down to the ground, which gave me a better look, I could see every detail, the color the flat sides it had. I got way to scared and turned my car around and took off. Then I could see in the rearview mirror that it started slowly moving again.
